v0.9,   1 July 2013 -- Initial release.

v0.9.1, 2 July 2013 -- Add missing license headers and LICENSE.txt for GNU LGPL.

v0.9.2, 2 July 2013 -- Fix packaging script errors.

v0.9.3, 9 July 2013 -- Fix tuple decode bug, add (undocumented) vis submodule,
                       add TCP mode to ipfix2csv.
